comments.raw_text: Currently, the outerHTML setter has to create a dummy HTML-namespaced node so that it has a context to pass to nsContentUtils::CreateContextualFragment. Should use nsContentUtils::ParseFragementXML instead.
comments.creator: hsivonen@mozilla.com
comments.text: Currently, the outerHTML setter has to create a dummy HTML-namespaced node so that it has a context to pass to nsContentUtils::CreateContextualFragment. Should use nsContentUtils::ParseFragementXML instead.
comments.author: hsivonen@mozilla.com

comments.text:
https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1472046

Move all DOM bugs that haven’t been updated in more than 3 years and has no one currently assigned to P5.

If you have questions, please contact :mdaly.
comments.author: bug-husbandry-bot@mozilla.bugs
